text: Pig is a 2021 American thriller drama movie co-written and directed by Michael Sarnoski. It stars Nicolas Cage, Alex Wolff and Adam Arkin. It is about a truffle forager whose favorite truffle-finding pig goes missing. It was released theatrically in the United States on July 16, 2021 to strong positive reviews. ==References== Category:2021 drama movies Category:2021 thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:British drama thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Sarnoski
